article.headline: White House spokeswoman says Trump 'will accept the results of a free and fair election'
article.body: White House Press Secretary Kayleigh McEnany on Thursday addressed President Donald Trump's refusal on Wednesday to commit to a peaceful transition of power in the event of his defeat in the Nov. 3 election. "The president will accept the results of a free and fair election," she said during a news conference. "He will accept the will of the American people."
